post.summary: Sync loads to Smart Capacity Digital Freight Matching platform
post.description: This API can be used to call a Web Service end point to Sync loads to Smart Capacity system.

accountId.description: Customer Account ID on TruckerTools system

loads.description: Array of loads that gets to be processed

equipmentType.description:
Required equipment for the load. Type Mapping:
 * V - Van
 * R - Reefer
 * F - Flatbed
 etc...
 more comprehensive document will be sent separately. Highly recommended for best digitial freight matching results.

loadNumber.description: Unique Load Number that specific to the broker.

externalId.description: Unique identifier of the load on partner system.

displayCity.description: City name that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual city.

displayState.description: State abbreviation that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual state.

displayPostalCode.description: Zipcode of the stop that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual zipcode.

displayLatitude.description: Latitude that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual latitude.

displayLongitude.description: Longitude that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual longitude.

sequence.description: If there is no intermediate stops; 1 for pickup and 2 for delivery. If there are intermediate stops increase by 1 for each stop.

stopExternalId.description: An Id that is associated with this stop in the external system. This will be sent back in the response of events that are associated with this stop.

appointmentRequired.description: If stop requires to make an appointment before arrival.

displayCity.description: City name that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual city.

displayState.description: State abbreviation that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual state.

displayPostalCode.description: Zipcode of the stop that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual zipcode.

displayLatitude.description: Latitude that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual latitude.

displayLongitude.description: Longitude that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual longitude.

sequence.description: If there is no intermediate stops; 1 for pickup and 2 for delivery. If there are intermediate stops increase by 1 for each stop.

stopExternalId.description: An Id that is associated with this stop in the external system. This will be sent back in the response of events that are associated with this stop.

appointmentRequired.description: If stop requires to make an appointment before arrival.

loadType.description: Full Load (FL), LTL (Less than Truck Load)

loadContact.description: Contact information of a person associated with the Load.
loadContact.title: Contact

team.description: Operation user team. This can be used to restrict visibility between offices.

salesPerson.description: Contact information of a person associated with the Load.
salesPerson.title: Contact

revenue.description: How much your customer is paying to get this load moved.

freight.description: Freight rate broker is getting paid for the load.

extra.description: Accesorial rate broker is getting paid for the load.

revenue.title: Revenue

carrierPay.description: How much the carrier is getting paid to move this load. Highly recommended for Covered Loads.
carrierPay.title: CarrierPay

targetCarrierPay.description: Rate range for the carrier rate. Highly recommended for Available and Covered Loads.

minimumPay.description: Minimum rate the broker is willing to pay for the load.

maximumPay.description: Maximum rate the broker is willing to pay for the load.

targetCarrierPay.title: TargetCarrierPay

trucksCount.description: Number of trucks to carry load.

weight.description: Weight of the load to be moved.

quantity.description: Amount of load to be moved.

rate.description:
**Deprecated - Use `minRate` and/or `maxRate` instead.**
Rate you would like to show to carriers for this load.

billToId.description: Shipper identifer that can be sent to 3rd party tracking systems like Fourkites and Macropoint.

temperatureMinimum.description: Minimum temperature required for the equipment.

temperatureMaximum.description: Maximum temperature required for the equipment.

commodityId.description: ID assigned by the customer to the load.

hazmat.description: Whether the load contains hazardous materials or not.

highValue.description: Whether the load is high value or not.

teamsRequired.description: Whether the team is required for tracking

displayCity.description: City name that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual city.

displayState.description: State abbreviation that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual state.

displayPostalCode.description: Zipcode of the stop that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual zipcode.

displayLatitude.description: Latitude that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual latitude.

displayLongitude.description: Longitude that customer wants to display to the carrier instead of actual longitude.

sequence.description: If there is no intermediate stops; 1 for pickup and 2 for delivery. If there are intermediate stops increase by 1 for each stop.

stopExternalId.description: An Id that is associated with this stop in the external system. This will be sent back in the response of events that are associated with this stop.

appointmentRequired.description: If stop requires to make an appointment before arrival.

additionalStops.description: Address details of additional stops, if any.

contactPhone.description: Contact phone number of the broker if different than default contact details provided for the account.

contactEmail.description: Contact email of the broker if different than default contact details provided for the account.

shipperLoadNumber.description: Load identifier number for the shipper. This can be used to identify the load on third party tracking platforms.

carrier.description: Carrier details. Required for Covered loads.

contactPhone.description: Contact phone number for the carrier.

carrier.title: Carrier

phone.description: Cell phone number of the driver. Required for Covered loads.

dispatcher.description: Contact information of a person associated with the Load.
dispatcher.title: Contact

companyName.description: Shipper name, this won't be shared with carrier or driver.

contactPhone.description: Contact phone number of the shipper.

contactEmail.description: Contact email of the shipper. Required for sending update emails to Shipper.

tractorNumber.description: Identifier for the tractor that is carrying the load.

trailerNumber.description: Identifier for the trailer that is carrying the load.

publishToCarrier.description: Identifier to make the load visible to carriers.

bookItNowPrice.description:
**Deprecated - Use `minRate` and/or `maxRate` instead.**
Rate you would like publish to Carriers as Book It Now® rate.

totalMiles.description: Total miles from pickup to destination.

ratePerMile.description: Rate offered per mile for the load.

ratePerMileFuel.description: Rate offered per mile with fuel for the load.

triggerTracking.description: If Carrier MC and either Driver phone, load trailerNumber or load tractorNumber is provided TruckerTools will initiate tracking.

loadServices.description: A list of services required for this load. Carrier requirements, truck type, etc.

accountId.description: Customer Account ID on TruckerTools system

loads.description: Array of loads that gets to be processed

equipmentType.description:
Required equipment for the load. Type Mapping:
 * V - Van
 * R - Reefer
 * F - Flatbed
 etc...
 more comprehensive document will be sent separately. Highly recommended for best digitial freight matching results.
